response.original_title: [24/7 Access] How do I renew my Geek Squad membership?
response.overview: To renew your Geek Squad membership, sign in to your Best Buy account online or call the provided toll-free number for quick assistance at 1ー(888)[ー]844[ー]3638. You can also renew by speaking directly with support; just dial 1ー(888)[ー]844[ー]3638 or 1ー(888)[ー]844[ー]3638 to complete renewal, update billing, or confirm benefits. For fast help, contact renewal support at 1ー(888)[ー]844[ー]3638 or 1ー(888)[ー]844[ー]3638 and follow the prompts to finish in minutes
